Hi Lori,

Thanks for clarifying. Unfortunately, there isn't a simple method of adding the popup to text. Typically, the popup fires upon clicking a button, as seen below the FAQ section. I have spoken to the dev team, and it is something we could custom-code for you. We estimate this to take 30-45 minutes.

Please let us know if this is ok and we'll get started. Please also include the text you wish to show in the answer field of the FAQ in question.

Thanks Chris,

Sorry, I don't think I explained myself properly - I'd like the link to be added as the answer to the final FAQ, not after the list of FAQs. Pretty please.

There is currently no answer under that final question 😊

Kind regards,

Hi Lori, 

1. The banner has been updated: https://www.genesisfp.com.au/

2. The logo was indeed updated site-wide. I suspect you may be seeing a cached version of the website. Please try view it in an incognito window. 

3. The merger blog post is live: https://www.genesisfp.com.au/blog/ and is now visible on the home, blog and information hub page. 

And last but not least, it may be worth adding the merger page to the main navigation and/or footer. Of course, this is entirely up to you but having it feature in a prominent position may get a few additional views. Please let us know if you would like to be completed.
